review: I was a doubter but this is totally legit. Simple controller very intuitive. Firestick menu layout is similar to netflix scrolling.
author: Kevin O

review: We've had our Fire Stick for about 2 months and we are really enjoying it. We got it when we cut our cable. Amazon content comes in clearly and quickly without buffering/downloading/etc. I haven't been thrilled with some of the 3rd party apps (Hulu plus runs pretty slowly for us- probably because we have slow internet service. It buffers frequently, but not so much I can't watch- just enough to be annoying). Overall, I am pleased with the Fire Stick and would recommend it.
author: Erin

review: I am so happy I finally bought this. I just wish I hadn't waited so long now...We love it.

review: The new Amazon Fire TV stick is a home run!  I have it attached to my HD projector on our screen porch.  Makes family time on the porch way more enjoyable.  Compared to the old Roku that we used,  the Fire TV Stick is light years ahead in speed, performance and functionality!
